data.name: Ele-Mental Demo
data.detailed_description:
Ele-Mental is a one of a kind action arcade absorb-em-up.
Charge your Ele-ments and absorb the enemies.

Demo Includes
    First 10 Missions2 Arcade Machines with 3 rounds each5 Survivals ( capped at 40 absorbs )2 Player Skins1 - 4 Player Local Play

If you like what you play, the full game has a lot more.
    Steam functionality - LeaderBoards / Achievements / Remote Play Together100 Missions 100 Survivals ( No absorb cap )10 Arcade Machines with 8 Rounds eachText Based Story Adventure modeCreator to make your own Missions and Survivals with all enemies and modsPure Co-op modes for 2 or 4 playersParty Mode for Competitive Tournaments14 Player skins4 player Mixing in the DJ Booth

Also includes a level Creator

data.short_description: Ele-Mental is an action arcade absorb-em-up Try the free demo, if you enjoy it, there is loads more to do in the full game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows
  • Processor: mid range
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: mid range
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Try it.
